user_stories.description: As a user, I want to view real-time stock quotes on the Stock Trading Mobile App.
As a trader, I want to execute market orders on the Online Stock Trading Platform.
As an investor, I want to see a breakdown of my portfolio by asset class on the Portfolio Dashboard Web App.
As a user, I want to receive push notifications for significant stock news on the Stock News Aggregator App.
As a trader, I want to set price alerts for specific stocks on the Stock Trading Mobile App.
As a user, I want to securely log in using two-factor authentication on the User Account Management App.
As a trader, I want to customize my trading interface on the Online Stock Trading Platform.
As a user, I want to search for specific news articles on the Stock News Aggregator App.
As an administrator, I want to monitor user access logs on the User Account Management App.
As a trader, I want to see real-time stock quotes in multiple currencies on the Stock Trading Mobile App.
As a user, I want to access trading data offline on the Stock Trading Mobile App.
As a trader, I want to set up automated trading strategies on the Online Stock Trading Platform.
As a user, I want to share stock news on social media via the Stock News Aggregator App.
As an investor, I want to calculate the tax implications of my stock trades on the Portfolio Dashboard Web App.
As a trader, I want to create watchlists of stocks on the Online Stock Trading Platform.

bugs.description: Stock Quote Service is returning incorrect data intermittently.
User authentication fails on the User Account Management App for some users.
Order Execution Service sometimes rejects valid orders without a clear reason.
The Portfolio Dashboard Web App crashes when loading large portfolios.
Stock News Aggregator App does not refresh news feeds as expected.
Online Stock Trading Platform displays incorrect account balances for some users.
User Account Management App experiences slow performance during peak usage hours.
Stock Trading Mobile App crashes on startup for Android users.
News Feed Service occasionally provides duplicate news articles.
Portfolio Management Service fails to update stock prices in real-time.
Online Stock Trading Platform does not display the trading volume correctly.
User Account Management App shows an incorrect error message when users input invalid passwords.
Stock Quote Service API documentation is outdated and incomplete.
Portfolio Dashboard Web App lacks proper error handling for network timeouts.
Stock News Aggregator App does not clear cached data properly, leading to storage issues.
Stock News Aggregator App does not load with GPS off.
